name: Spice Drive
description:
This game was made in two days for the 18th edition of the GM(48) game jam.
It's about Don, a spice merchant in the milky way neighborhood, and You, a creature made of exotic matter, that powers his Warp Drive to go and sell spice in other "Near" galaxies.

For now it has 5 levels, a little bit of story, and some dank memes here and there.

If I make a full game out of this I'll put it here, keep waiting for now.
